alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 11:53AM EST until March 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Virginia, Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Western Pendleton and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
